address: Level - 04, 34 Awal Center, Kemal Ataturk Avenue, Banani, Dhaka - 1213

home.title: Leading outsourcing company for HR, Administrative, Safety & Security, and Expatriate Management

highlights.title: HRIS Service
highlights.body: With our proprietary web-based HRIS software, you can manage all your HR activities from the ease and comfort of your browser.

highlights.title: Payroll Service
highlights.body: Run you payroll system, independently or end-to-end, with the support of our web-based payroll software. We also provide tax-related information and support.

highlights.title: Headhunting & Activity Outsource Management
highlights.body: Reach, engage and connect with the best talent. Through a standard assessment & hiring process, we will get you in touch with them.

highlights.title: Expatriate Service
highlights.body: Hire the talent you need, from anywhere in the world. We have over 10 years of experience providing support for expatriate services.

home.intro: The company was established with an understanding to give their esteemed clients a service solution which will be unique so that our clients can rely on us for any of their service requirements and consider ReThink Ltd. a dependable business partner. Our moral is to give service as per the company vision - Solutions, Never before.

services.title: Inventory Management
services.body: Our own web based Inventory management software will help you run a smooth inventory process.

services.title: Safety Management
services.body: We help with safety measures for fire, earthquake, drills & CC-TV. We can set up fire safety equipment, company safety handbook and a security team.

services.title: Expatriate Support
services.body: We provide comprehensive visa, work permits & related solutions to ensure a hassle free on-boarding for your valuable employees.

services.title: Learning & Development
services.body: We can arrange training, learning & development. We will provide full support for employee skill development and knowledge.

services.title: ISO, Audit and Implementation
services.body: We are affiliated with international technical partners on arranging business assessment, consulting and management training of ISO management systems.

services.title: Interior Design and General Office Items Supply
services.body: We have an expert architect and interior design team to support organization at any level. We can also arrange the supply of General Items and Office Items.

experience.title: Leading services business company since 2017
experience.body: Our team has over 2 decades of experience in working with brand names like YKK, Airtel BD. Ltd, Warid Telecom, Bank Al Falah, Seibu Electric Japan etc. We have a long history of providing safe, reliable, quality service in the fields of HR service, outsource service, expatriate management service, safety & security solution, IT support, general support service, facility & logistic service, as well as training services. We are capable of giving 360 degree services that will make your business smoother, more efficient and easier to operate while we worry about the tedious everyday details.

about.heading: ReThink Ltd. is established with a vision to give unique service solutions to businesses.
history: The company was established in 2017 with an understanding to give their esteemed clients a service solution which will be unique so that the clients can rely for any of its service requirements and consider ReThink Ltd as a dependable business partner. ReThink Ltd moral is to give service as per the company vision - solutions, Never before. Our team has over 2 decades of experience in working with brand names like YKK Bangladesh Pvt. Ltd., Airtel BD. Ltd, Warid Telecom, Seibu Electric Japan, etc. We have a long history of providing safe, reliable, quality service in the fields of HR service, payroll service and activity outsource service, expatriate management service, safety & security solution, IT support, general support service, facility & logistic service, as well as training services.

We are capable of giving 360 degree services that will make your business smoother, more efficient and easier to operate while we worry about the tedious everyday details. We can also accommodate special needs for your business which we may not be offering yet. Please send us an email us (Info@rethinkltd.com) or fill up the contact form in the contacts tab; we would love to get back to you.

services.title: Outsource Your Business Operations
services.body: Count on our outsourcing experiences and your business requirements.

services.title: We Cater To Your Need
services.body: Every business is unique. We cater to your unique requirements and offer full range of business outsourcing services.

services.title: Holistic Services
services.body: We care about our business clients and go steps beyond.

items.title: HRIS Service
items.body: Our own web based HRIS software to manage complete HR activities of the organization. We customize it as per your company's need and provide on call service for support - anytime you need.

items.title: Payroll Service
items.body: Our own web based Payroll software will help you run the payroll system independently and end to end with our support. We also provide Tax related information support within the software.

items.title: Headhunting & Activity Outsource Management
items.body: A word class candidate hiring experience. Reach, engage and connect with talent, wherever they may be. We will find for you the most competitive resources for the organisation through a standard assessment & hiring process. We facilitate the whole process end-to-end.

items.title: Expatriate Service
items.body: We cater to both expatriates and their employers by providing comprehensive solutions such as visa, work permits, airport protocol, accommodation and tax file support.

items.title: Inventory Management Service
items.body: Our own web based Inventory management software will help you run a smooth inventory management process. We also offer you the option to offload this responsibility to our efficient team.

items.title: Safety Management Service
items.body: We evaluate of risk factors of your organization. This Includes evaluation of safety requirement of the organization, designing & implementation of safety solution for the organization- (fire and earthquake, drills and CC TV), business continuity management etc as per ISO Standard.

items.title: Learning & Development Service
items.body: We can arrange training, learning & development. We will provide full support for employee skill development and knowledge.

items.title: ISO, Audit and Implementation Service
items.body: We are affiliated with international technical partners on arranging business assessment, consulting and management training of ISO management systems.

items.title: Interior Design and General Office Items Supply
items.body: We have an expert architect and interior design team to extend any such support to your organization on any level. We can also extend support on arranging supply of General Items and Office Items as per your organization requirement.
